description: Represents one run of a DataBrew job.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the job being processed during this run.

parameters.name: RunId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the job run.

nested_items.name: Attempt
nested_items.description: The number of times that DataBrew has attempted to run the job.

nested_items.name: CompletedOn
nested_items.description: The date and time when the job completed processing.

nested_items.name: DatasetName
nested_items.description: The name of the dataset for the job to process.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: A message indicating an error (if any) that was encountered when the job ran.

nested_items.name: ExecutionTime
nested_items.description: The amount of time, in seconds, during which the job run consumed resources.

nested_items.name: JobName
nested_items.description: The name of the job being processed during this run.

nested_items.name: ProfileConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration for profile jobs. Used to select columns, do evaluations, and override default parameters of evaluations. When configuration is null, the profile job will run with default settings.

nested_items.name: DatasetStatisticsConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration for inter-column evaluations. Configuration can be used to select evaluations and override parameters of evaluations. When configuration is undefined, the profile job will run all supported inter-column evaluations.

nested_items.name: IncludedStatistics
nested_items.description: List of included evaluations. When the list is undefined, all supported evaluations will be included.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Overrides
nested_items.description: List of overrides for evaluations.

nested_items.name: Statistic
nested_items.description: The name of an evaluation.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: A map that includes overrides of an evaluation's parameters.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ProfileColumns
nested_items.description: List of column selectors. ProfileColumns can be used to select columns from the dataset. When ProfileColumns is undefined, the profile job will profile all supported columns.

nested_items.name: Regex
nested_items.description: A regular expression for selecting a column from a dataset.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of a column from a dataset.

nested_items.name: ColumnStatisticsConfigurations
nested_items.description: List of configurations for column evaluations. ColumnStatisticsConfigurations are used to select evaluations and override parameters of evaluations for particular columns. When ColumnStatisticsConfigurations is undefined, the profile job will profile all supported columns and run all supported evaluations.

nested_items.name: Selectors
nested_items.description: List of column selectors. Selectors can be used to select columns from the dataset. When selectors are undefined, configuration will be applied to all supported columns.

nested_items.name: Regex
nested_items.description: A regular expression for selecting a column from a dataset.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of a column from a dataset.

nested_items.name: Statistics
nested_items.description: Configuration for evaluations. Statistics can be used to select evaluations and override parameters of evaluations.

nested_items.name: IncludedStatistics
nested_items.description: List of included evaluations. When the list is undefined, all supported evaluations will be included.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Overrides
nested_items.description: List of overrides for evaluations.

nested_items.name: Statistic
nested_items.description: The name of an evaluation.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: A map that includes overrides of an evaluation's parameters.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: EntityDetectorConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration of entity detection for a profile job. When undefined, entity detection is disabled.

nested_items.name: EntityTypes
nested_items.description: Entity types to detect. Can be any of the following:
USA_SSN.
EMAIL.
USA_ITIN.
USA_PASSPORT_NUMBER.
PHONE_NUMBER.
USA_DRIVING_LICENSE.
BANK_ACCOUNT.
CREDIT_CARD.
IP_ADDRESS.
MAC_ADDRESS.
USA_DEA_NUMBER.
USA_HCPCS_CODE.
USA_NATIONAL_PROVIDER_IDENTIFIER.
USA_NATIONAL_DRUG_CODE.
USA_HEALTH_INSURANCE_CLAIM_NUMBER.
USA_MEDICARE_BENEFICIARY_IDENTIFIER.
USA_CPT_CODE.
PERSON_NAME.
DATE.

nested_items.name: AllowedStatistics
nested_items.description: Configuration of statistics that are allowed to be run on columns that contain detected entities. When undefined, no statistics will be computed on columns that contain detected entities.

nested_items.name: Statistics
nested_items.description: One or more column statistics to allow for columns that contain detected entities.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ValidationConfigurations
nested_items.description: List of validation configurations that are applied to the profile job.

nested_items.name: RulesetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the ruleset to be validated in the profile job. The TargetArn of the selected ruleset should be the same as the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset that is associated with the profile job.

nested_items.name: ValidationMode
nested_items.description: Mode of data quality validation. Default mode is 'CHECK_ALL' which verifies all rules defined in the selected ruleset.

nested_items.name: RunId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the job run.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the job run entity itself.

nested_items.name: LogSubscription
nested_items.description: The current status of Amazon CloudWatch logging for the job run.

nested_items.name: LogGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of an Amazon CloudWatch log group, where the job writes diagnostic messages when it runs.

nested_items.name: Outputs
nested_items.description: One or more output artifacts from a job run.

nested_items.name: CompressionFormat
nested_items.description: The compression algorithm used to compress the output text of the job.

nested_items.name: Format
nested_items.description: The data format of the output of the job.

nested_items.name: PartitionColumns
nested_items.description: The names of one or more partition columns for the output of the job.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket name.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The unique name of the object in the bucket.

nested_items.name: BucketOwner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the bucket owner.

nested_items.name: Overwrite
nested_items.description: A value that, if true, means that any data in the location specified for output is overwritten with new output.

nested_items.name: FormatOptions
nested_items.description: Represents options that define how DataBrew formats job output files.

nested_items.name: Delimiter
nested_items.description: A single character that specifies the delimiter used to create CSV job output.

nested_items.name: MaxOutputFiles
nested_items.description: Maximum number of files to be generated by the job and written to the output folder. For output partitioned by column(s), the MaxOutputFiles value is the maximum number of files per partition.

nested_items.name: DataCatalogOutputs
nested_items.description: One or more artifacts that represent the Glue Data Catalog output from running the job.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Web Services account that holds the Data Catalog that stores the data.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of a database in the Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The name of a table in the Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: S3Options
nested_items.description: Represents options that specify how and where DataBrew writes the Amazon S3 output generated by recipe jobs.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket name.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The unique name of the object in the bucket.

nested_items.name: BucketOwner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the bucket owner.

nested_items.name: DatabaseOptions
nested_items.description: Represents options that specify how and where DataBrew writes the database output generated by recipe jobs.

nested_items.name: TempDirectory
nested_items.description: Represents an Amazon S3 location (bucket name and object key) where DataBrew can store intermediate results.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket name.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The unique name of the object in the bucket.

nested_items.name: BucketOwner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the bucket owner.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: A prefix for the name of a table DataBrew will create in the database.

nested_items.name: Overwrite
nested_items.description: A value that, if true, means that any data in the location specified for output is overwritten with new output. Not supported with DatabaseOptions.

nested_items.name: DatabaseOutputs
nested_items.description: Represents a list of JDBC database output objects which defines the output destination for a DataBrew recipe job to write into.

nested_items.name: GlueConnectionName
nested_items.description: The Glue connection that stores the connection information for the target database.

nested_items.name: DatabaseOptions
nested_items.description: Represents options that specify how and where DataBrew writes the database output generated by recipe jobs.

nested_items.name: TempDirectory
nested_items.description: Represents an Amazon S3 location (bucket name and object key) where DataBrew can store intermediate results.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket name.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The unique name of the object in the bucket.

nested_items.name: BucketOwner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the bucket owner.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: A prefix for the name of a table DataBrew will create in the database.

nested_items.name: DatabaseOutputMode
nested_items.description: The output mode to write into the database. Currently supported option: NEW_TABLE.

nested_items.name: RecipeReference
nested_items.description: Represents the name and version of a DataBrew recipe.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the recipe.

nested_items.name: RecipeVersion
nested_items.description: The identifier for the version for the recipe.

nested_items.name: StartedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user who started the job run.

nested_items.name: StartedOn
nested_items.description: The date and time when the job run began.

nested_items.name: JobSample
nested_items.description: Sample configuration for profile jobs only. Determines the number of rows on which the profile job will be executed. If a JobSample value is not provided, the default value will be used. The default value is CUSTOM_ROWS for the mode parameter and 20000 for the size parameter.

nested_items.name: Mode
nested_items.description: A value that determines whether the profile job is run on the entire dataset or a specified number of rows. This value must be one of the following:
FULL_DATASET - The profile job is run on the entire dataset.
CUSTOM_ROWS - The profile job is run on the number of rows specified in the Size parameter.

nested_items.name: Size
nested_items.description: The Size parameter is only required when the mode is CUSTOM_ROWS. The profile job is run on the specified number of rows. The maximum value for size is Long.MAX_VALUE.
